subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
; “Hui”
: From earlier name {{zh-l|回回}}, variant of {{zh-l|回鶻}}, from {{der|zh|otk|𐰆𐰖𐰍𐰆𐰺|tr=uygur}}. {{doublet|zh}} of {{zh-l|維吾爾}}.
